00063 {
00064         friend class KviKvsObject;

00072                 Error = 0, 
00073                 Success = 1, 
00074                 HaltEncountered = 2 
00075         };
00076

00081                 InstructionList, 
00082                 Expression, 
00083                 Parameter 
00084         };
00085

00090                 PreserveParams = 1, 
00091                 // FIXME: This should be a global option, eventually
00092                 AssumeLocals = 2, 
00093                 // FIXME: This should be a global option, eventually
00094                 Pedantic = 4, 
00095                 Quiet = 8 
00096         };

00308 class KVIRC_API KviKvsScriptData
00309 {
00310         friend class KviKvsScript;
00311 protected:
00312         unsigned int                m_uRefs;     // Reference count for this structure
00313 
00314         QString                     m_szName;    // script context name
00315         QString                     m_szBuffer;  // NEVER TOUCH THIS
00316         const QChar               * m_pBuffer;   // this points to m_szBuffer: use it to extract string data
00317 
00318         KviKvsScript::ScriptType    m_eType;     // the type of the code in m_szBuffer
00319 
00320         KviKvsTreeNodeInstruction * m_pTree;     // syntax tree
00321         unsigned int                m_uLock;     // this is increased while the script is being executed
00322 };
